firstnameValid1: You must include a first name.
firstnameValid2: Your first name must be at least 5 characters long.
firstnameValid3: Your first name cannot exceed 10 characters.
emailValid1: You must include an email address.
emailValid2: You must include a valid email address.
emailValid3: Email or password is not correct.
passwordValid2: Password should be 6 letters at least.
agreeTermsofService: You have to read and agree to the terms of service.

Creator: Creator

paymenttooltip: Click here to select the payment you would like to make
creationtooltip: Click here to create a new group
requestinfo: List of requests you have received from another rollincome member. This can be a request to join a group, make a payment etc ...
timelineinfo: List of all the most request event of the groups.
groupnameinfo: Choose a name for your group, there will be one name per group/user/amount/status(running)
grouptypeinfo: Type of a group, private for a group created with your close friend or/and family, private for group created with people you don't know
groupmonthinfo: It's a number representing the number of month: is the frequency at which the payment will occur, example: every 1 month.
groupcurrencyinfo: The base currency of your group. This will define the currency for the payment
grouprateinfo: Interest rate that will apply when paying back the coupons
groupdayinfo: Date at which the payment is due during the month.
grouppenalinfo: Number of days of delay before applying a penalty.
grouppaymentinfo: By selecting this the intestest rate payment will be smoothed accross the payment. This means, you will not be able to select payment by hand option.
grouppstypeinfo:
Selection the method of selection the position in the group. 
* Open selection means the first arrived is the first served. 
* Best index credit  means the first best index credit choose his position first, then it's to second best index to choose and so on. 
* Order by index credit means the members are order by index credit descendant.
